title: Such conversion shall be subject payment of the premium at the rate of 20% of Annual Schedule of Rat
clause_text: Such conversion shall be subject payment of the premium at the rate of 20% of Annual Schedule of Rates (ASR rate) of developed land or as may be decided by Government from time to time out of which 50% amount towards Government share shall be deposited in the office of the Deputy Director of Town Planning, Greater Mumbai and subject to the following:
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone
